body_html:
Hi,
I am having the same problem when trying to run tensorflow-gpu that returns
ImportError: Could not find 'cudart64_90.dll'

I have installed CUDA 9.0 onto my computer.
Also, copied cuDNN files into my path /NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit/CUDA/v9.0/

It still isn't working.

Any idea how this can be fixed?

Thanks

body:
Hi,
I am having the same problem when trying to run tensorflow-gpu that returns

Also, copied cuDNN files into my path /NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit/CUDA/v9.0/
